values: 缝隙；空隙；裂缝；间隔；间断；间隙；差距；分歧；隔阂；断层；空白；开口；缺口
形成缺口；有缺口；张开；裂开；造成缝隙；产生裂隙；造成分歧；使出现断层

word_group.brief_definition: 缩小差距；消除隔阂；弥补差距
缩小差距；填补缺口；缝合间隙
填补差距；填补缺口；填补空白
外贸逆差, 贸易赤字

bilingual.source: Mind the gap when boarding the train.
You can add a shim to reduce the gap.
bilingual.target: 你可以添加一个垫片来减少间隙。

bilingual.source: Measure the gap; it should be exactly half-inch.
bilingual.target: 测量这个间隙，它应该正好是半英寸。

bilingual.source: The synaptic gap is where neurotransmitters are released.
bilingual.target: 突触间隙是神经递质释放的地方。

bilingual.source: She used spacers to create a gap between the shelves.
bilingual.target: 她使用间隔物在架子之间制造了一个间隙。

bilingual.source: The gap between the two parts is less than a millimeter.
bilingual.target: 两个部件之间的间隙小于一毫米。

bilingual.source: The gap between the two parts is less than a millimetre.
bilingual.target: 两个部件之间的间隙不到一毫米。
传感器可以是间隙传感器。

bilingual.source: The top frame covers the gap portion.

list.abstract: GAP（盖璞），美国最大的服装公司之一，由Donald和Doris Fisher于1969年在美国旧金山创立，Bob L. Martin为临时首席执行官兼董事会执行主席。1976年，Gap在美国上市。2022年，GAP逐渐退出中国市场。 旗下拥有五个品牌：GAP、Banana Republic、Old Navy、Piperlime、Athleta 。主要产品有1969 JEANS系列等。 当地时间2024年3月7日，Gap发布截至2024年2月3日的四季度报，第四财季净销售额43亿美元，同比增长1%；第四财季门店销售额与2023年同期相比增长了 4%；营业利润为2.14亿美元，营业利润率为5.0%。

GAP是Good Agricultural Practices 的缩写，中文意思是“良好农业规范”。从广义上讲，良好农业规范（Good Agricultural Practices,GAP）作为一种适用方法和体系，通过经济的、环境的和社会的可持续发展措施，来保障食品安全和食品质量。它是以危害预防（HACCP）、良好卫生规范、可持续发展农业和持续改良农场体系为基础，避免在农产品生产过程中受到外来物质的严重污染和危害。该标准主要涉及大田作物种植、水果和蔬菜种植、畜禽养殖、牛羊养殖、奶牛养殖、生猪养殖、家禽养殖、畜禽公路运输等农业产业等。

yingyinNormal.en: It's the gap, look at the gap. It's wrong. Everything else is perfectly ordered, managed. The whole thing's verging on OCD.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有空缺，你看这空缺，不对劲，每件东西都摆放齐整，位置妥当简直跟强迫症一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Business leaders at companies like The Gap are doing their part.
yingyinNormal.zh: 像Gap这样的企业也做出了自身的努力。

yingyinNormal.en: That's not just good. That's remarkable. That kind of gap just doesn't exist in Cook County.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不仅是好，太了不起了，这种差距在库克县是不曾有过的。

yingyinNormal.en: John stays. This is family. That's why he stays. So there were three Holmes kids. What was the age gap?
yingyinNormal.zh: 约翰要留下。这是家事。所以他要留下！所以福尔摩斯家有三个小孩。年龄差多少？

yingyinNormal.en: I condemn Alex Garrideb. Mind the gap. Congratulations, you got the right one. Now, go through the door.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我宣布阿列克斯·加利代布有罪。“注意站台空隙。”恭喜你，回答正确。穿过门。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, first of all, what you call a gap was nearly three feet wide. I slipped and skinned my knee. Are you okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，那段你声称仅三英尺宽的距离让我滑倒摔伤了我的膝盖。你还好吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, but with a very long gap in the middle. We only met properly a few days ago and now you want to spend the rest of your life with me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，可中间断了很长时间的联系，直到几天前我们才再次相遇，而你这就说想跟我共度余生了。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine. Good luck to you. The military is already interested in my system, and my math is worked out. His still has a big gap in it. Where? There.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，祝你们好运。军方已经对我的系统感兴趣了，我的运算也都完成了。他的运算中还有一个大空白，在哪里？就这儿。

yingyinNormal.en: It was your 50th birthday, Mr Welsborough, of course you were disappointed that your son hadn't made it back from his gap year. After all, he was in Tibet. Yes. No. No?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那天是你50岁生日，韦尔斯伯鲁先生，你当然非常失望你儿子还在毕业旅行中没赶回来，他人可在西藏呢。对。不对。不在吗？

yingyinNormal.en: My respects. This figurine is routinely re-positioned after the cleaner's been in, this picture is straightened every day, yet this ugly gap remains. Something's missing from here, but only recently.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无意冒犯，这个小雕像在清洁工每次打扫过之后，都要重新归位，这幅照片也是每天都仔细摆放，但却有个这么难看的空缺，少了件东西，而且是最近才少的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 空隙; 缺口; 缺失

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 成绩差距；成绩落差；成就差距
缩小差距；填补缺口；缝合间隙
填补差距；填补缺口；填补空白

examination_example.sentence: But despite common misconceptions, a <highlight>gap</highlight> year does not hinder the success of academic pursuits — in fact, it probably enhances it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是尽管存在着一些普遍的误解，间隔年并不会阻碍学业追求上的成功——实际上，它很可能有助于成功。

examination_example.sentence: But while this may be true, it's not a good enough reason to condemn <highlight>gap</highlight> years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管这可能是真的，但这也不足以成为谴责间隔年的理由。

examination_example.sentence: Taking a <highlight>gap</highlight> year to figure things out initially can help prevent stress and save money later on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 选择间隔年一开始就把事情弄明白有助于预防压力，之后还能节省金钱。

sense_info_list.en: a difference, especially an undesirable one, between two views or situations

examination_example.sentence: But even if you cannot close that <highlight>gap</highlight>, maybe you can close others, and doing so would be to the benefit of all concerned.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使你不能缩小这一差距，也许你可以缩小其他差距。这么做对所有相关方都有利。

examination_example.sentence: It's that <highlight>gap</highlight> in between, and that's where the problem is.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是两者之间的差距，这就是问题所在。

examination_example.sentence: They cite past research by several authors to show that this is the <highlight>gap</highlight> that must be narrowed to close the achievement <highlight>gap</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们引用了一些作者之前的研究，说明只有缩小这一差距才能缩小学业差距。

sense_info_list.zh: 空隙; 缺口; 缺失

examination_example.sentence: A toothy grin (especially when there were <highlight>gaps</highlight> or blackened gnashers) lacked class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 露齿而笑(尤其是牙齿有缝隙或发黑的时候)缺乏风度。

examination_example.sentence: There is a <highlight>gap</highlight> in working-class jobs, but the workers who need those jobs most aren't equipped to do them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工人阶级的工作存在缺口，但最需要这些工作的工人却没有能力做这些工作。

examination_example.sentence: Giving more children this training could increase the number of people interested in the field and help fill the jobs <highlight>gap</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给更多的孩子提供这种培训可以增加对该领域感兴趣的人数，并有助于填补就业缺口。

sense_info_list.en: a difference that separates people, or their opinions, situation, etc.
a period of time spent doing something different

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 缩小差距；消除隔阂；弥补差距

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a difference, especially an undesirable one, between two views or situations

examination_example.sentence: It can bridge the learning <highlight>gap</highlight> between kids of different backgrounds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以弥补不同背景的孩子之间的学习差距。

examination_example.sentence: Creating a <highlight>gap</highlight> between her income and spending required a paradigm shift and entailed sacrifice and commitment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在她的收入和支出之间创造差距需要范式转变，需要做出牺牲和承诺。

examination_example.sentence: Narrowing the existing <highlight>gap</highlight> between the rich and the poor.

sense_info_list.en: a period of time spent doing something different
a break or hole in an object or between two objects

examination_example.sentence: So I'd either have to leave a lot of <highlight>gaps</highlight> or make a lot more assumptions than a historian should.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，我要么留下很多空白，要么做出比历史学家更多的假设。

sense_info_list.en: an unfilled space or interval; a break in continuity

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a difference; especially an undesirable one; between two views or situations

examination_example.sentence_trans: 从全国范围来看，差距甚至更大。

examination_example.sentence: The gender pay <highlight>gap</highlight> based on median salaries across the sector in 2016 -2017 was 13.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于 2016 年至 2017 年整个行业的薪水中位数，性别薪酬差距为 13。

examination_example.sentence: The gender <highlight>gap</highlight> on this question is even wider among working adults in their 30s and 40s, when many women face the trade-offs that go with work and motherhood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于30-40岁的职场人来说，性别差异在这一问题上的体现尤其明显。许多职场女性面临着在工作和为人母之间做权衡。

sense_info_list.en: an unfilled space or interval; a break in continuity

examination_example.sentence: It further widens the <highlight>gap</highlight> between the old and the young.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它进一步拉大了老年人和年轻人之间的差距。

sense_info_list.en: a period of time spent doing something different
a break or hole in an object or between two objects

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指较宽的、不规则形状的裂缝。
词义较广，可指任何空隙、无障碍空间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a period of time spent doing something different

examination_example.sentence: More and more students are taking a <highlight>gap</highlight> year to earn money to support their study for the degree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的学生选择间隔年来赚钱以支持他们的学业，获得学位。
